briefTitle: Granulocyte-colony Stimulating Factors or Antibiotics for Primary Prophylaxis for Febrile Neutropenia
officialTitle: A Multi-Centre Study to Compare Granulocyte-colony Stimulating Factors to Antibiotics for Primary Prophylaxis of Taxotere/Cyclophosphamide-Induced Febrile Neutropenia REaCT-TC2
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Histologically confirmed primary breast cancer
* Planned TC chemotherapy
* ≥19 years of age
* Able to provide verbal consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Contraindication to either Ciprofloxacin or G-CSF
